item.title: Using Elixir 1.5's open command with Emacs.app
item.description: If you are a user of Emacs, you may have seen Chris McCord’s post on the Dockyard blog last week about using Elixir 1.5’s new open command in IEx with terminal Emacs. Being an Emacs user, but preferring Emacs.app generally to the terminal Emacs, I decided to investigate applying his work to my own workflow. I promised to write it up if I succeeded, so here we are! The first thing we need to do is place some scripts (or symlink them) in /usr/local/bin.
